summary.para: Performs the shrink activation function on every element in InputTensor, placing the result into the corresponding element of OutputTensor.
summary.code: f(x) = x - Bias, if x > Threshold x + Bias, if x < -Threshold 0, otherwise
summary.para: This operator supports in-place execution, meaning that the output tensor is permitted to alias InputTensor during binding.
The input tensor to read from.
The output tensor to write the results to.
The value of the bias. A typical default for this value is 0.0.
The value of the threshold. A typical default for this value is 0.5.
